body:
a graphic designer from Taiwan


Work Experience

  • Senior Graphic Designer, NEWEGG.com(Aug 2014 - Aug 2015)

    • Senior Graphic Design with 10+ years of experience in the management of the complete design process, from conceptualization to delivery.
    1. Backpack design,
    2. Web design,
    3. Marketing material design,
    4. Packages design

  • Senior Graphic Designer, Genius(May 2006 - Aug 2014)

    • Developed numerous marketing programs (logos, brochures, packages, CIS, and advertisements) and guaranteed that they exceeded the expectations of our clients.
    Managed up to 3 projects or tasks at a given time while under pressure to meet weekly deadlines.
    1. Banner design,
    2. VI design,
    3. Marketing material design,
    4. Packages design

    Education

    Shih-Chien University,Taipei
    Bachelor of Fine Arts in Fashion Design May 2008

    Skills

  • Proficiency in Adobe Creative Cloud (InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop)

  • Skilled in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Powerpoint)

  • Operating systems include Windows, Mac

    • Contact

    Email: prettykellyk@gmail.com

    Reference

     Gwen Kao, 104 Hunter Consultant/ Email: gwen.kao@1o4.com.tw
